## sum() function

Higher order gen. Returns a [MapG2](./dsp.mapg2.md) or [MapG3](./dsp.mapg3.md) yielding stepwise (non-accumulated) sums of given [IGen](./dsp.igen.md)<!-- -->s. Initializes to 0.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sum(a: IGen<number>, b: IGen<number>): IGen<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | <code>IGen&lt;number&gt;</code> | summand |
|  b | <code>IGen&lt;number&gt;</code> | summand |

<b>Returns:</b>

`IGen<number>`
